column3: Y-You want to know what I do? But my name─I thought it was obv─ahem. Very well. What I do is quite simple: I take any of the materials you've collected on the island, and sell them for cowries on your behalf. Don't worry, I <Emphasis>never</Emphasis> take anything for myself. Trust me.
Sell materials in your isleventory to the enterprising exporter in exchange for islander's cowries.
In addition, the enterprising exporter may be willing to part with seafarer's cowries in exchange for uncommon materials in your isleventory.

Why, hello there, friend of the owner! (Pssst, just between you and me, I might have a little something for you...if you've got the cowries.) <bleep> Oh, I didn't see you there, felicitous! Don't you worry, I'm just conversing with this lovely individual here. (Nosy cat bastard...)
